content:
Colonel Natalia Humeniuk told how many Circon missiles have accumulated Russian invaders in temporarily occupied Ukrainian Crimea.

Natalia Humeniuk made a corresponding statement duringlive etherOn the evening of March 26, 2024 in the evening of "One News".

“The experience of this time has shown that the use of rockets such as Zircon with increased range indicates that air alarm will be proclaimed to the Kyiv region to the northern regions when applying ballistics from the south. Therefore, there is an understanding that several dozen such rockets have an enemy in the assault on the Militar-Habi type of Crimea, and he can continue from time to time point terror with emphasis, including the capital, ”said the spokeswoman for the southern Ukraine defense forces.

Read in the Armyinform,What is known about Zircon missiles and how unique they are.
title: The defense forces reported the number of Russian "zircon" in Crimea
